sections.question: Do you need backups, snapshots or replication of your data?

options.label: I need one or more backup/snapshot copies of the data, and need to be able to restore data from previous points in time (high durability).
I need to have replicate copies of the data to minimize downtime (high availability).

sections.question: How much data do you have and how fast will it grow?

options.label: Greater than 1TB or likely to exceed in 2 years.

sections.question: Do you have special performance needs?

options.label: I am likely to have more than 1,000 files in a single directory within two years.
My data interactions demand high transaction or transfer rates.

sections.question: How are you expecting to access the data?

options.label: I need easy access to this data from anywhere, even when I don't have my own computer or mobile device with me.
I frequently need access from a mobile device such as a phone or tablet.

sections.question: With whom do you need to share your data regularly?

options.label: Only those with a Syracuse NetlD
Users in and out of the Syracuse community
